__Important Notice: RFP for Boat Safety Belts__ [Procurement Reference: WS3641827669, Solicitation ID: WS3641827669]
=====================================================

### Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of boat safety belts for the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG).

### Overview
This RFP aims to procure Forty-Eight (48) boat safety belts. The contract is classified under the UNSPSC code 46182300, indicating that the goods and services required fall within the category of fall protection and rescue equipment.

### Key Details
*   **Publication Date**: February 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be considered non-responsive.
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region), New Brunswick, and Nova Scotia
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Contact Information**: Joanne M (SPAC/PSPC) <joanne.m.ladouceur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

### Rationale
The CCG requires the procurement of boat safety belts to support its operations. The successful bidder will be selected based on the lowest price.

### Requirements
All bidders must submit their proposals in the prescribed format, along with all required supporting documentation, by the tender closing date. No extensions will be granted.

### Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time as specified in the previous notice. 

[**View Full Details on Ariba Discovery Platform**](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15443028?extsite=MTU0NDMwMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
